title: 17.10 to main manual
body: The purpose of this PR is to preserve the commits that were squashed when merged in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/9992/commits

commit.message:

Dispose AssemblyInformation in GetAssembliesMetadata (#9974)

Fixes AB#2017198 by releasing the handle to the file by disposing the AssemblyInformation deterministically.
